overview:
Avi Beluca is a Licensed Associate Real Estate Broker with Halstead Property,a Sister company of Brown Harris Stevens and one of the largest and most visible residential real estate brokerage firms in New York.

He built a reputation working with buyers sellers and renters, in Manhattan and Brooklyn. Prior to joining Halstead, he owned and operated two of his own real estate firms in NYC, Prestige Group and AVI Realty. Avi graduated from the Swedish Institute College of Medicine.
